items.title: Anker’s eufy S350 indoor security cam with a 360-degree view and AI tracking drops back to $100 (Reg. $140)
items.summary:
Through its official eufy Amazon storefront, Anker is offering its S350 Security Indoor Cam back down at $99.99 shipped. Normally going for $140 at full price, this is the most repeated deal we’ve seen on this camera over 2025, often coming in once a month. While we have seen it go as low as $80 in the past (once during the most recent Prime Day event), if you missed out three weeks ago, you’re getting the next-best price since mid-July that we have tracked. You’ll be upgrading your interior security with a 29% markdown that cuts $40 off the going rate, landing it at the fourth-lowest overall price.
